publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1332 John Scott: Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change-That the Parliament notes the Scottish Executive's climate change consultation programme; further notes Her Majesty's Government's commitment to reduce greenhouse gases in order to respond to global warming, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consult urgently on measures to deal with the consequences of climate change, to strengthen flood defences, to address the question of planning developments in flood plains and to minimise environmental damage.

S1M-1332 John Scott: Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change-That the Parliament notes the Scottish Executive's climate change consultation programme; further notes Her Majesty's Government's commitment to reduce greenhouse gases in order to respond to global warming, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consult urgently on measures to deal with the consequences of climate change, to strengthen flood defences, to address the question of planning developments in flood plains and to minimise environmental damage.
S1M-1332 Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change (lodged on 9 November 2000) Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Neil*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1332 Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change (lodged on 9 November 2000) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*, Alex Fergusson*
S1M-1332 Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change (lodged on 9 November 2000) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Nick Johnston*

S1M-1332 John Scott: Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change-That the Parliament notes the Scottish Executive's climate change consultation programme; further notes Her Majesty's Government's commitment to reduce greenhouse gases in order to respond to global warming, and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consult urgently on measures to deal with the consequences of climate change, to strengthen flood defences, to address the question of planning developments in flood plains and to minimise environmental damage. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Nora Radcliffe, Donald Gorrie, Alex Fergusson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Nick Johnston
S1M-1332 Addressing Problems Caused by Climate Change (lodged on 9 November 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Neil, Mr Keith Harding, Nora Radcliffe, Donald Gorrie, Alex Fergusson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Murray Tosh, Nick Johnston, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Mr David Davidson*
